| web = [http://www.disneyxd.co.uk] | sat chan 1 = Channel 607 (Sky) }} This is a British [[cable television]] [[channel]]. ==Programming== Like the US Version it includes original shows minimium disney channel programming and shorts. ===Original Shows=== [[Aaron Stone]] (August 31, 2009 - December 5, 2010) [[Zeke and Luther]] (October 3, 2009 â Present) [[Kick Buttowski]] (February 20, 2010 â Present) [[I'm in the Band]] (March 6, 2010 â Present) [[Pair of Kings]] (January 3, 2011 â Present) [[Kickin' It]] ===Co-productions=== [[Jimmy Two-Shoes]] (April 4, 2009 - Present) [[Kid vs. Kat]] (2009 - Present) ===Disney Channel Shows=== [[Suite Life of Zack and Cody]] (August 31, 2009 â Present) [[Suite Life On Deck]] (September 4, 2010 â Present) [[Phineas and Ferb]] (August 31, 2009 â Present) [[American Dragon: Jake Long]] ===Shorts=== Next X : Season 1 (2009) Next X : Season 2 (2011) Goalmouth (May 5, 2011 - Presnt) ===Upcoming Shows=== [[Tron: Uprising]] (Autumn 2012) [[Ultimate Spider-Man (TV series)]] (Winter 2011/2012) [[Scaredy Squirrel (TV series)|Scaredy Squirrel]] (September 2011) Motorcity (Winter/Spring 2013) [[Total Drama World Tour]] (April 2012) [[Total Drama Revenge of the Island]] (April 2013) ===Non-Disney Shows=== [[The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes]] (October 20, 2010 â Present) [[Iron Man]](Armoured Adventures) [[X-Men]] [[The Incredible Hulk]] [[Fantastic Four]] [[Total Drama Action]] (April 11, 2011 ) ===Movies=== [[Jump In]] [[Minutemen]] [[Skyrunners]] [[Spy Kids]] [[Spy Kids 2]] [[Spy Kids 3-D: Game Over]] [[Underdog]] [[Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow]] [[Scream Team]] [[Pirates of the Carribean]] [[Meet the Robinsons]] [[Osmosis Jones]] ===Former Disney XD and Jetix Shows=== [[Total Drama Island]] Jetix : April 1, 2009 - May 6, 2009.
